page.title: 09HOUSING ESTATES
page.content: I live in Lon Cedric Four Mile Bridge.Near to where I live there are estates called Rhodfa Gwilym and Heol Bradwen.The estate that I live on is called The Saltings Estate because each house over looks the sea.Lots of old people live near me and they are very freindly.The milkman calls around at half past seven in the morning a little later the postman comes.Every house on the estate has a garden but the back gardens are bigger than the front.The bus stops outside our estate and the older people who don't have cars catch the bus.
